en.title: American Golfer Gerry James Wins With Quantum Pendant!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE SPOKESMAN WORLD LONG DRIVE RECORD HOLDER LANCE READER.

Paul, just a little note on another Quantum Pendant win! Gerry James will not compete in Long Drive or as a professional golfer without the Quantum Pendant. He is the 2 times REMAX World Long Drive Champion and has just won the very prestigious North Florida PGA Sectional Championship with the Krank El Diablo Driver and FE's Quantum Pendant! I called him and told him to pull out the Quantum Pendant in front of his shirt next time when they take pictures. You can see the Quantum Pendant rope. Thanks for everything! Lance.
